---
id: pix-dict-refund-create-v-2
title: "Create a Refund Request"
description: "Create a Refund Request. Only the debited participant can create a Refund Request."

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a Refund Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/refund"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create a Refund Request. Only the debited participant can create a Refund Request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixRefundRequest","description":"","required":["transactionId","refundReason","refundAmount"],"type":"object","properties":{"transactionId":{"description":"Transaction being contested. End-to-end or RtrId identifier. Must respect the pattern '\\w{32}'.","pattern":"\\w{32}","type":"string"},"refundReason":{"description":"Reason for Refund request.","enum":["FRAUD","OPERATIONAL_FLAW","REFUND_CANCELLED"],"type":"string"},"refundAmount":{"description":"Amount requested for Refund.","pattern":"\\d{1,10}\\.\\d{2}","type":"string"},"refundDetails":{"description":"Brief description of the reason for requesting a refund.","maximum":2000,"type":"string"}},"example":{"transactionId":"E0000000020210928014001806253553","refundReason":"FRAUD","refundAmount":"1.22","refundDetails":"teste"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
